title: Visual 3D Modeling Learning Path
description: This personalized learning path is designed for beginners with a visual learning style interested in 3D modeling. The path focuses on providing a comprehensive understanding of 3D modeling concepts and techniques, leading to certification.

milestones.title: Introduction to 3D Modeling
milestones.description: Learn the basics of 3D modeling, including tools and techniques.

milestones.title: Understanding 3D Shapes and Textures
milestones.description: Explore creating and manipulating 3D shapes and textures.

milestones.title: Lighting and Rendering in 3D
milestones.description: Learn about lighting techniques and rendering in 3D modeling.
